Articles.Content:
hey guys, after some research on google images i found some interesting schemes of SLS, so i decided to make my own sandbox space program, and for make it possible i would like that you give me some missions and ideas of what to make with my orions, so the first thing to do are test flights that i'll post tomorrow but now i want that you everyone select the first bodie to go.

sorry for my bad engish (i should say it 30 posts ago)

Edited July 29, 2017 by Spaceman17

Mun. Minimus is too easy. Duna is a little tough for a first visit to another body, all though doable, and Eve is kind of the same, unless you have landing on it in mind, which will require a very big and complex lander. Now Gilly, Eve's moon, is a different story and you could probably land on it with the orbiter, if you have enough dV to get back.

Fire
well during test of the block 2 i've seen that it's capable of making an flyby around duna and return, and with some assistance of ike i can send myself into orbit
